content: Wrote a complete `pyproject.toml` configuring a minimal setuptools-based Python project with a CLI entry point (`experiments`), core numeric/symbolic dependencies, an optional plotting extra, and default formatter/linter/test tool settings.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=68", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta\""",
"""[project]
name = "generated_script_1766440325922"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Prototype numerical/symbolic experiments with a small reproducible CLI."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.11"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI Code Interpreter"}]
dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.26",
  "sympy>=1.12",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
plot = ["matplotlib>=3.8"]

[project.scripts]
experiments = "main:main\""",
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = {"" = "src"}
py-modules = ["main"]

[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ["py311"]

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 88
target-version = "py311"
lint.select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP"]
lint.ignore = ["E501"]
lint.fixable = ["ALL"]

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
addopts = "-q"
testpaths = ["tests"]"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=68", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"
""",
"""[project]
name = "generated_script_1766440325922"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Prototype numerical/symbolic experiments with a small reproducible CLI."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.11"
license = { text = "MIT" }
authors = [{ name = "OpenAI Code Interpreter" }]
dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.26",
  "sympy>=1.12",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
plot = ["matplotlib>=3.8"]

[project.scripts]
experiments = "main:main"
""",
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = { "" = "src" }
py-modules = ["main"]

[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ["py311"]

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 88
target-version = "py311"
lint.select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP"]
lint.ignore = ["E501"]
lint.fixable = ["ALL"]

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
addopts = "-q"
testpaths = ["tests"]
"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Wrote a complete `pyproject.toml` configuring a minimal setuptools-based Python project with a CLI entry point (`experiments`), core numeric/symbolic dependencies, an optional plotting extra, and default formatter/linter/test tool settings.
